HappyDoc Generated Documentation: pyVC  

The base package for pyVC, containing all other modules and packages.

TODO: add support for more Servers(DNS? TFTP?) and starting Servers on Real Machines TODO: support new QEMU, XEN, UML, VMware? TODO: add support for more disk types TODO: support heterogeneous networks

This package contains a universal object that is used by all derived classes, Config. Config reads the pyVC configuration file from ~/.pyVC.ini, pyVC.ini, and /etc/pyVC.ini, in that order. All options in the config file are then stored in the Config object.

>>> config = Config()

Derives from: dict

Modules and Packages   

pyVC/

Disks

This package contains the modules used for virtual machine storage.

Helpers

This package contains the modules used for helpers.

Machine

Module containing the classes to represent a Machine object and its associated errors

Networks

This package contains the modules used to create virtual networks

RemoteMachine

Package containing the class for a Remote Machine object

Specifications

This package contains the modules for virtual cluster specification

VirtualMachines

This package contains the modules for virtual machines

The base package for pyVC, containing all other modules and packages.
